name: RGB Rebirth
description:
Programming Language / Framework : Haxe / Haxeflixel

Programmers: HydroGene & D3nX

Graphisms : D3nX

Musics : HydroGene

Controls

We really recommand you to play with a gamepad!

-- Gamepad --

  • Move : Directional Pad /  Left Thumbstick
  • Axe attack : X
  • Magic attack : B

-- Keyboard --

  • Move : Arrows keys
  • Axe attack : X
  • Magic Attack : C
